conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway rendering with clear floor-to-wall separation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals. All conditions met with high geometric precision.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful; however, the exterior window in the utility area is rendered as a standard window rather than the specific shafts indicated in the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent furniture matching. Bed, dining set, sofa, and kitchen appliances are correctly placed and scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. One minor artifact where the balcony door frame meets the floor plane.

detected_errors.description: Utility/Toilet shaft window geometry differs slightly from the specific 2D architectural hatch.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric across all rooms and furniture placements.
